backend/main.mo: Main canister defining items, branding, profiles, basket operations, and authorization with storage mixins and Stripe config.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module transforming old branding into new branding format with hero text while preserving existing state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping frontend files to implemented features, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app layout with routing, header branding, basket indicator, authentication UI, and page route definitions.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Component showing an access denied message and navigation button for non-admin users.
Provides UI for admins to edit an item's description and upload a replacement image using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublishTogg: Renders a toggle to publish or unpublish an item, showing current status and handling async mutations.
frontend/src/components/ItemCard.tsx: Displays an item preview card with image, title, description, price, and navigation to the item detail page.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles authentication via Internet Identity and shows login, logout, or admin menu options based on user state.
frontend/src/components/Model3DViewer.ts: Loads and displays a 3D model in a Three.js canvas with controls and fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/PriceEditor.tsx: Allows admins to edit and save an item's price with validation and mutation status feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontHeroMe: Shows the storefront hero section using either a 3D model or image plus customizable title/subtitle.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: Dialog for entering and saving Stripe secret key and allowed countries to configure payments.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBasket.ts: Manages a list of item IDs in localStorage with add, remove, clear, and retrieval helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and exposing login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for items, profiles, admin checks, and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripe.ts: Defines React Query hooks for Stripe config checks, updates, checkout session creation, and session status retrieval.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with custom typography settings.
frontend/src/lib/idEncoding.ts: Encodes and decodes Uint8Array IDs to and from URL‑safe base64 strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Renders the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBrandingPage.tsx: Admin page allowing branding edits including app name, logo, hero media, and hero text, with file upload handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBulkUploadPage.t: Admin page for selecting multiple image files, tracking upload progress, and performing bulk photo uploads to create items.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin settings page showing Stripe configuration status and navigation to branding and other admin tools.
frontend/src/pages/BasketPage.tsx: Displays basket contents, validates item availability, and initiates Stripe checkout for eligible items.
frontend/src/pages/ItemDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed item info with purchase options, admin editing tools, and Stripe checkout flow.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Simple page indicating a cancelled payment with navigation back to storefront or basket.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Handles post-payment confirmation, clears basket, refreshes item data, and displays success messaging.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Public storefront showing hero media and a grid of available items.
frontend/src/utils/brandingMedia.ts: Utility functions for validating, inferring content type, and constructing media metadata for branding uploads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, version, features, and architectural notes for the storefront and admin system.
